VMCollectInformation.ProcessingCommand: $VMGeneration = (Get-AzDisk -Name (Get-AzVM -ResourceGroupName $AzVMResourceGroup -Name $AzVMName).StorageProfile.OsDisk.Name).HyperVGeneration; if ($VMGeneration -eq 'V1') { Set-Variable -Name VMGeneration -Scope Script -Value 'Gen1'; 'Gen1' } else { Set-Variable -Name VMGeneration -Scope Script -Value 'Gen2'; 'Gen2' }

Is OS/DB combination supported for SAP on Azure
Checking if tuned profile for SAP HANA is applied

Checks.ProcessingCommand: expectedresult='Timeout (watchdog) : 60'; result=0; for i in $(echo '$_ClearTextPassword' | sudo -S cat /etc/sysconfig/sbd | grep '^SBD_DEVICE' | cut -d '=' -f 2 | tr -d '"' | tr ';' ' '); do resultcommand=$(echo '$_ClearTextPassword' | sudo -S sbd -d ${i} dump | grep watchdog); if [[ $resultcommand == $expectedresult ]]; then result=$((result + 1)); else result=$((result - 10)); fi; done; if [ $result -gt 0 ]; then echo 'OK'; else echo 'ERROR'; fi

expectedresult='Timeout (msgwait)  : 120'; result=0; for i in $(echo '$_ClearTextPassword' | sudo -S cat /etc/sysconfig/sbd | grep '^SBD_DEVICE' | cut -d '=' -f 2 | tr -d '"' | tr ';' ' '); do resultcommand=$(echo '$_ClearTextPassword' | sudo -S sbd -d ${i} dump | grep msgwait); if [[ $resultcommand == $expectedresult ]]; then result=$((result + 1)); else result=$((result - 10)); fi; done; if [ $result -gt 0 ]; then echo 'OK'; else echo 'ERROR'; fi
/sbin/pcs quorum status | xargs | grep 'Expected votes: 2' | wc -l
$_result=0; foreach ($_loadbalancer in $Script:_LoadBalancers) { if ($_loadbalancer.idletimeout -eq 30) { $_result+=1 } else { $_result-=10 }; }; if ($_result -gt 0) {1} else {0}
$_result=0; foreach ($_loadbalancer in $Script:_LoadBalancers) { if ($_loadbalancer.floatingip -eq $true) { $_result+=1 } else { $_result-=10 }; }; if ($_result -gt 0) {1} else {0}
$_result=0; foreach ($_loadbalancer in $Script:_LoadBalancers) { if ($_loadbalancer.protocols -eq 'All') { $_result+=1 } else { $_result-=10 }; }; if ($_result -gt 0) {1} else {0}
